definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The small port has developed into a big city.
sentences.chinese: 该小港市已发展成为一个大城市。

sentences.english: Yadar I'm from the Lotus Pond Valley of the big Tieling City. My name's Yadar.
sentences.chinese: 我是来自大城市铁岭莲花池水沟子的，我名字叫丫蛋。

sentences.english: In China's big cities, real estate's expensive and young women are in short supply.
sentences.chinese: 中国的大城市，房价高企，年轻女子的行市紧俏。

sentences.english: Down town Naperville gives you a feel of a charming small town; yet with a big city dynamics. There are many restaurants;
sentences.chinese: 瑞珀市中心是一个迷人的小镇，但也有大城市的活力。

sentences.english: Residents of many major urban areas complain of 20-hour-long daily blackouts.
sentences.chinese: 很多大城市的居民抱怨每天断电时间长达20小时。

sentences.english: A hillbilly was visiting the big city for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 一个乡下人第一次到大城市游逛。

sentences.english: S. city has at least a half-dozen places where you can find a decent green chicken curry.
sentences.chinese: 今天，任何一个美国大城市能都找到正宗的绿咖喱鸡。

sentences.english: A fisherman abandons his big-city life to find himself in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 渔夫放弃了大城市来到了野外生活。

sentences.english: The little town mushroomed into a big city.
sentences.chinese: 这座小镇迅速发展成一座大城市。

sentences.english: York is the capital city of Yorkshire and was once known as England's "second" city.
sentences.chinese: 约克城是约克郡的首府，曾一度为英格兰第二大城市。

sentences.english: So that's what we're doing over here, visiting the big cities of America.
sentences.chinese: 所以那就是我们来这里的原因，参观美国的大城市。

sentences.english: There are many shooting halls in big cities.
sentences.chinese: 大城市里有许多射击馆。

sentences.english: Water shortages are a global problem, especially in big cites .
sentences.chinese: 水资源紧张是全球问题，大城市更为突出。

sentences.english: New DiscoveryA hillbilly was visiting the big city for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 一个乡下人第一次到大城市游逛。

sentences.english: The city of Harbin is a big city.
sentences.chinese: 哈尔滨市是一个大城市结束。

sentences.english: Most of these ancient towns are far away from the mega-cities and near to the nature and countryside.
sentences.chinese: 这些古镇大部分远离大城市，亲近自然和农村。

definition: Beijing, Shanghai and Guangzhou/abbr. for 北京、上海、廣州|北京、上海、广州
Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou and Shenzhen/abbr. for 北京、上海、廣州、深圳|北京、上海、广州、深圳
outer suburbs/remote outskirts of a city
to settle down/to set up a home
